They say skins win games and to that i say lies after buying a FN Glock-18 Fade and feeling like a badass for 3 casual games and then hopping on in comp and managing getting one tapped by a usp, i realized the glock is ass, i sold it and got  cheap glock because the once again the glock sucks it's terrible give me a p2000 over the glock-18 hell give me  a zeus over it hell i would rather just use a knife than a glock-18, you have a better chance. For the love of what's holy delete the gun from the game and give me a p2000 on T Side.
